channel.title: Eevee appreciation thread // Congratulations DatBird/Chloe!
channel.description:
I feel like this post is deserving of it's own thread
[quote="eevee, post:13876, topic:81930, full:true"] ## Event.
## eevee has left the forum, they were:
> ![image|120x120](upload://cvYlNAun9EGfY6lA7a5opxBgzqC.png) > > ## [color=pink]eevee[/color] >[color=pink]*Chaotic host and random moderator.*[/color] > > **Moderator** - You were granted abilities of **Ban** and **Appeal**. > > **Wincon:** Make sure everyone has a good time on this forum.
Tbh... that's not a joke.
Ladies and gentleman, this is last time you saw me inside a mod squad. Why? Becouse I plan to move onward with my life and focus on more... private stuff, you know. I will miss you and I think you will miss me too. But it's not like I'm disappearing forever, I will show up now and then to play some games. I won't, however, have enough time to actively moderate this forum, hence the decision to step down from the position.
Let's get back to a flavor however, which was more true than you could expect.
[quote="Small_Tank, post:4, topic:81930"] Luxy was demoted. Squid went missing in action and noone really knows when they will return. Arete is too much of a nerd to count as a proper forum mod. And eevee? eevee got banned for excessive use of alts. Obviously. :eyes:
Amid this chaos 2 factions has emerged: First, the Users Union, fought to elect new mod from most active forum users. Second, the Judge Alliance, tried to keep the power in hands of ToL judges.
They were led by two respected forum users: DatBird and Chloe.
They both had forum’s best intentions in the mind. [/quote]
# Last eevee's mod announcement:
> ## PoisonedSquid was temporarily demoted due to being MIA. > They will be allowed to return to theirs previous position at any time, after they deal with IRL problems. > ## I would like to welcome Chloe and DatBird as new members of moderation team. > Congratulations! > I hope you will lead this community much better than I could ;) > Make it easy for them guys, don't break too much rules :stuck_out_tongue: > > ## And last one: Arete is still too much of a nerd.
EEVEE OUT. [/quote]
I apologize if you don't want this to be made into a thread, but it seems like big enough news to warrant it? <small>If you disagree you're free to delete this, eevee
~~i wasnt sure what to name this thread someone please suggest a better name~~

item.title: Eevee appreciation thread // Congratulations DatBird/Chloe!
item.dc:creator: Leafia
item.description:
Congratulations DatBird and Chloe! You deserve to become mods and even with the short time we’ve known each other Eevee, I can already tell that you’re a great Eevee. I feel honored to have been able to take part in an Eevee game before you stopped being a mod. Thank you for having me as a part of your game. I had a blast.

Read full topic

item.title: Eevee appreciation thread // Congratulations DatBird/Chloe!
item.dc:creator: anon97870008
item.description:
clonedcheese:

apparently “ToL judge” and “Mod” are different things?

To clarify: fol mods are mods only for the forum. Tol judges and mods have automatically forum moderation powers as well, but usually are not responsible for organizing FM etc. Arete and Chloe do both now.

Read full topic

item.title: Eevee appreciation thread // Congratulations DatBird/Chloe!
item.dc:creator: DatBird
item.description:
Yeah to keep it short and sweet

Eevee, ur a great dude, and have helped me a lot. Ur antics are gonna be missed. Please keep in contact

Chloe, ur great, thought u were a mod already as I appreciated all the work ya did to help everyone

Arete, ur awesome, cant wait to work with ya more

Also ty for all the great people who have kept me here this whole time

and finally thank you for the Queue and Review team, yall great

Read full topic

item.title: Eevee appreciation thread // Congratulations DatBird/Chloe!
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
without making a giant mushy post (thats reserved for DMs)

@eevee I know i’ve only been around for a few months, so I’ve only experienced half a year of eeveeness, but I wanna let you know that I appreciate all you’ve done for the forums. Things won’t be the same without you, and we have some big shoes to fill.

@DatBird You’ve practically been a mod for the past few months, with how much you help out. All you need is the fancy colored name, and a banhammer. I’m hella looking forward to flailing around working with you. This is mega deserved

@Arete you werent mentioned in the title but you deserve appreciation too. ily

Read full topic
